    • PaypalConfig

      @Autowired public PaypalConfig(org.keycloak.admin.client.Keycloak keycloak, UserService userService, ListingService listingService, EmailService emailService)
      Paypal Configuration
      Parameters:
      keycloak - the keycloak
      userService - the user service
      listingService - the listing service
      emailService - the email service

  • Method Details

    • createPayment

      public com.paypal.api.payments.Payment createPayment(Double total, String currency, String method, String intent, String description, String successUrl, String cancelUrl, Integer listingId) throws com.paypal.base.rest.PayPalRESTException
      Creates a PayPal Payment object with specific details such as price, currency, payment method, etc. The payment object is sent to PayPal for processing.
      Parameters:
      total - The total amount to be paid
      currency - The currency (e.g., USD, EUR)
      method - Payment method (must be "paypal")
      intent - Payment intent (e.g., "sale" or "authorize")
      description - A description of the payment/message to the payer
      successUrl - The callback URL for successful payment
      cancelUrl - The callback URL for canceled payment
      listingId - Custom ID to track the associated transaction (e.g., a product or order ID)
      Returns:
      A Payment object created via PayPal APIs
      Throws:
      com.paypal.base.rest.PayPalRESTException - In case of communication error with PayPal

    • executePayment

      public com.paypal.api.payments.Payment executePayment(String paymentId, String payerId) throws com.paypal.base.rest.PayPalRESTException
      Executes a previously approved PayPal payment using payment ID and payer ID. This completes the payment process.
      Parameters:
      paymentId - The ID of the previously created payment
      payerId - The ID of the payer who approved the payment
      Returns:
      The Payment object containing the finalized payment details
      Throws:
      com.paypal.base.rest.PayPalRESTException - In case of communication or execution error

    • createAndSendInvoice

      public com.paypal.api.payments.Invoice createAndSendInvoice(com.paypal.api.payments.Payer payer, String itemName, Double itemPrice, String currency, int quantity, Long listingId) throws com.paypal.base.rest.PayPalRESTException, jakarta.mail.MessagingException, IOException
      Creates an invoice with the given details and sends it to the specified customer email address.
      Parameters:
      payer - The payer
      itemName - The name of the item being invoiced.
      itemPrice - The price of the item in the specified currency.
      currency - The currency code for the item price.
      quantity - The quantity of the item.
      listingId - the id of the antiquity
      Returns:
      The created and sent Invoice object.
      Throws:
      com.paypal.base.rest.PayPalRESTException - If an error occurs while creating or sending the invoice.
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      IOException

    • generateCustomId

      public String generateCustomId(Long listingId)
      Generates a custom identifier string for a given listing ID.
      Parameters:
      listingId - the ID of the listing for which the custom identifier is to be generated. Must be a non-null, positive number.
      Returns:
      a custom identifier string in the format "Antiquity-listingId".
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided listingId is null or not a positive number.
